RCAIDE.Library.Plots.Aerodynamics.Airfoil package

Submodules

RCAIDE.Library.Plots.Aerodynamics.Airfoil.plot_airfoil_boundary_layer_properties module

RCAIDE.Library.Plots.Aerodynamics.Airfoil.plot_airfoil_boundary_layer_properties.plot_airfoil_boundary_layer_properties(ap, save_figure=False, show_legend=False, file_type='.png', save_filename='Airfoil_with_Boundary_Layers', width=12, height=7)[source]

Plots viscous distributions

Assumptions: None

Source: None

Inputs:

ap : data stucture of airfoil boundary layer properties

Outputs:

Figures of quantity distributions

Properties Used: N/A

RCAIDE.Library.Plots.Aerodynamics.Airfoil.plot_airfoil_boundary_layer_properties.plot_quantity(ap, q, qaxis, qname, ylim_low, ylim_high, file_type, show_legend, save_figure, width, height)[source]

Plots a quantity q over lower/upper/wake surfaces

Assumptions: None

Source: None

Inputs:

ap : data stucture of airfoil boundary layer properties q : vector of values to plot, on all points (wake too if present) qaxis : name of quantity, for axis labeling qname : name of quantity, for title labeling

Outputs:

Figure showing q versus x

Properties Used: N/A
